abstract: There is a new high bid in the auction for the C-block of wireless spectrum, the most attractive block of frequencies the government is selling. Analysts are guessing a phone company, perhaps Verizon, has outbid Google.
snippet: There is a new high bid in the auction for the C-block of wireless spectrum, the most attractive block of frequencies the government is selling. Analysts are guessing a phone company, perhaps Verizon, has outbid Google.

headline.main: Spectrum Auction: A New Bidder Emerges For the C Block

abstract: With Microsoft hoping to buy Yahoo, Google has begun to lay the groundwork to try to delay or derail any deal.
snippet: With Microsoft hoping to buy Yahoo, Google has begun to lay the groundwork to try to delay or derail any deal.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  It could be payback time.

headline.main: Google and Microsoft Take Up Battle Stations
headline.print_headline: Google and Microsoft Take Up Battle Stations

byline.original: By Stephen Labaton and Miguel Helft

abstract: With Yahoo reluctant, Microsoft aggressive and Google determined, the struggle for one of the Internet’s pioneers has quickly become a full-on brawl. But with so many (theoretical) outcomes, how will the battle over Microsoft’s $31-per-share takeover offer play out?
lead_paragraph: With Yahoo reluctant, Microsoft aggressive and Google determined, the struggle for one of the Internet’s pioneers has quickly become a full-on brawl. But with so many (theoretical) outcomes, how will the battle over Microsoft’s $31-per-share takeover offer play out?

headline.main: Setting the Odds on Yahoo’s Fate
